title: Dawid Woźniak - Junior Front End Developer - Interactive CV

experience.description:
Collaborate in an agile team (Development and Product Definition) and help develop solutions as a member of the Amadeus UI R&D Team. The main activities include:
_ Design and build advanced UI for the web platform and open-backend part.
_ Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.
_ Work with outside data sources and API’s
_ Work on bug fixing and improving application performance.
_ Continuously discover, evaluate, and implement new technologies to maximize development efficiency.
experience.stack: Angular, Java EE, JavaScript, CSS, HTML

experience.description: I help with the practise sessions for 1st-year students. I'm responsible for signing off and grade what people have done. So this job demands good communication skills and knowledge from modules from 1st year. As a student ambassador, I work during events such as Open Days / Visiting Days / Information Fairs and Events away from the Campus. Within these events, my role is a range from meeting and greeting visitors, helping with a car parking, providing Campus Tours and being a friendly face around campus.
